text: Ara yadi tumi tajjaba ha'o tabe ajaba byapara hacche tadera katha -- ''ki, amara yakhana dhulo haye yaba takhana ki amara bastabika'i natuna jibana labha karaba?â€™â€™ Era'i tara yara tadera prabhura prati abisbasa posana kare, ara era'i -- edera galaya thakabe sikala, ara era'i habe agunera basinda, tate tara karabe abasthana.
